        @GetMapping(path="/user/{user_id}")
public User getUserById(@PathVariable
                                                             int user_id)

        Returns:

      • getUserByEmail

        @GetMapping(path="/user/email/{email}")
public User getUserByEmail(@PathVariable
                                                                    java.lang.String email)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        finds a user by the input email
        Parameters:
        email - input email
        Returns:
        user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the email doesn't exist in the database

      • login

        @PostMapping(path="/login")
public java.lang.String login(@RequestBody
                                                           Login login)
        attempts to log a user in by checking their credentials against what's in the database
        Parameters:
        login - a special model with the input email and password
        Returns:
        either success with the user id or a failure message

      • allRecipes

public java.util.List<Recipe> allRecipes(@PathVariable

        Parameters:
        user_id - the id of the user
        Returns:

public java.util.List<Recipe> allFavorites(@PathVariable
                                                                                          int user_id)
        gets a list of a certain user's favorites
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • favorite

public java.lang.String favorite(@PathVariable
                                                                                             int user_id,

                                                                                             int recipe_id)
